question: Which of the following is NOT correct about Sodium chloride?
option2: It is also known as common salt
option3: It is also used in de-icing of roadways during snowfall
option4: It is used as a food preservative
explanation: Sodium chloride (NaCl) is used as a common salt or table salt for domestic purpose and used as a food preservative. It is an ionic compound. It is also used in de-icing of roadways during snowfall.
